post.title: samsung a650 vs toshiba xf550
post.content: has anybody compared the a650's to the toshiba xf550 series? i currently have a 32 inch samsung which has done me good the last couple of years and am looking to upgrade to a 46 full 1080p. i have been doing some research and the samsungs seem to be getting alot of problems so i am looking for a backup plan.
